meanings.definition: A person who engages in a duel.
meanings.sent1: The duellers faced each other with swords drawn.
meanings.sent2: The duellers agreed to settle their dispute through a duel.
meanings.sent3: The duellers decided to have a duel over who gets the last cookie.
meanings.sent4: The duellers' swords clashed in the heat of battle.
meanings.sent5: The image of the duellers standing back to back before the duel was intense.

meanings.sent1: Many duellers gathered at the dueling arena.
meanings.sent2: The crowd cheered as the duellers prepared for the duel.
meanings.sent3: The duellers formed a club for those who enjoy dueling as a hobby.
meanings.sent4: The duellers' determination was evident in their eyes.
meanings.sent5: The group of duellers practiced their swordsmanship skills diligently.
